title: Why Is The Air Quality So Bad? Weather And Health Experts Explain What's Up With All The Smoke
description: What is a Code Red and why, maybe, you shouldn't go for that run outside.
cleaned_text: This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible.
